name: main menu
dialogHeader: I should make a main menu first...

name: main menu pretty
dialogHeader: Those buttons look a bit bland, maybe I should improve them just a bit...
doItText: They're the first thing a player sees, they should be beautiful!

name: first level pretty
dialogHeader: Those models look awful, I should work on them a bit...
doItText: Let me show you my amazing drawing skills!

name: ground hazards
dialogHeader: I should add some ground hazards ...
doItText: I know just the thing; spikes!

name: more enemies
dialogHeader: I should add some more enemy choices, this might get boring...
doItText: Let's do it, I have some great ideas!

name: prettier enemies
dialogHeader: Yeaaah, I think those enemy models need some work...
doItText: Let me show you my amazing drawing skills!
